FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 109 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 **BEAUTIFUL GIFT** 2018 f SEA GIFT, by A.P. Indy. Winner in 1 start at 3, 3,738 Pounds, in England. Sent from United States to United Arab Emirates in 2003. Returned to United States from Great Britain in 2005. (Total: $6,814). Half-sister to **Bicoastal** (Total: $91,130, 2nd Normandie Stud Prestige S. **[G3]**), **Cherry Baby** (Total: $28,891, 2nd Clasico Santorin **[G3]**, etc.). Dam of 14 foals, 10 to race, 7 winners-- update on line 41: + **BEAUTIFUL GIFT** (2018 f. by Medaglia d'Oro).
